Package com.github.jsonj.tools

Utilities for working with json.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JsonBuilder
    Builder class for json objects.
    JsonParser
    Parser based on json-simple.
    JsonSerializer
    Utility class to serialize Json.
    JsonXmlConverter
    Helper class to get a DOM representation of a json element.
